comment.author: 40648104@N05
comment._content: Malta does not have, and never had, gondolas. Small hired transport boats in Malta are called Dghajsa (pronounced, Dice-a).

comment.author: 8716770@N08
comment._content: I think this should be labeled Valletta, the new (i.e 16th century) capital of Malta.

comment.author: 40648104@N05
comment._content: @LucyGraceBarber, I think it may actually be  Senglea, looking from Valletta across the Grand Harbor.
